docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: I am version 3.0.0 For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Document kinds
docs.text: Tag Description tutorial Tutorials to get started with Mutiny. guides Topic-centric guides on how to use Mutiny. reference Reference documents to understand core concepts in Mutiny.

docs.title: Audience level
docs.text: Tag Description beginner Reading materials if you are new to Mutiny intermediate Intermediate operations beyond the basics advanced Advanced operations beyond classic usage of Mutiny

docs.title: Expressing branches as Uni operations
docs.text:
Suppose that we have a pipeline where a Uni is created from a random value, and suppose that we want to have a different processing pipeline depending on whether the value is odd or even. Let’s have these 2 Uni-returning methods to model different behaviors:

@SpringBootApplication
@EnableScheduling
@EnableAsync
public class SpringBootGettingStartApplication {

    private final static Logger LOGGER = LoggerFactory.getLogger(SpringBootGettingStartApplication.class);

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        SpringApplication.run(SpringBootGettingStartApplication.class, args);
    }

}
